body:
Hi everyone! I just wanted to share a music group with you guys. Now, I know everyone has different favorite genres of music but, I believe you must listen to this group. Some history, A group of 5 people Acapella. YOU MUST LISTEN.

Pentatonix-Daft Punk
http://youtube.com/watch?v=3MteSlpxCpo
(Pretty cool music to groove too, the beatboxer surprises me with all the varieties of musix)

Pentatonix-Say Something
http://youtube.com/watch?v=0dYlvdLdK9w
(This is a truly inspirational song, their acapella routine+a viola touches my heart and I hope it touches yours too.)

-I have listened to a couple of other songs by Pentatonix but, these are my highlights. Anyways, Happy listening!

*I have made sure these songs are appropriate for people of all ages and that it is not advertising of any other minecraft related communities.

title: [Music] Pentatonix (MUST LISTEN :0)

replies.body: dude I love pentatonix and I can't wait to go and see them soon when I got to see their concert!!

replies.body: This is personally one of my favorite music groups...I think a lot of people would enjoy listening to them. Thanks for sharing :D

replies.body: Wow thanks for the vids, they're amazing! Just listened to three more of their covers and they're the best acapella group i've ever heard! :)

replies.body: That song, as well as Carol of the Bells and Little Drummer Boy, are my favorites from them.
replies.body_tagged: That song, as well as Carol of the Bells and Little Drummer Boy, are my favorites from them.

reply_to.body:
I love Pentatonix.

Especially their song, Winter Wonderland/Don't Worry Be Happy (ft. Tori Kelly).
reply_to.body_tagged:
I love Pentatonix.

Especially their song, Winter Wonderland/Don't Worry Be Happy (ft. Tori Kelly).

replies.body: I've known this a capella group for quite a while now. I've always loved their music! The different elements put together are just wonderful.
